quote: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: For every minute you are angry, you lose sixty seconds of happiness.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: The purpose of life is not to be happy. It is to be useful, to be honorable, to be compassionate, to have it make some difference that you have lived and lived well.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Happiness depends upon ourselves.
author: Aristotle

quote: The happiest people don't have the best of everything, they just make the best of everything.
author: Anonymous

quote: You will never be happy if you continue to search for what happiness consists of. You will never live if you are looking for the meaning of life.
author: Albert Camus

quote: Happiness is a warm puppy.
author: Charles M. Schulz

quote: Be happy for this moment. This moment is your life.
author: Omar Khayyam

quote: To be happy, we must not be too concerned with others.
author: Albert Camus

quote: The greatest happiness you can have is knowing that you do not necessarily require happiness.
author: William Saroyan

quote: Happiness is not by chance, but by choice.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: The most important thing is to enjoy your life—to be happy—it's all that matters.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: Happiness is a direction, not a place.
author: Sydney J. Harris

quote: The art of being happy lies in the power of extracting happiness from common things.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: Count your age by friends, not years. Count your life by smiles, not tears.
author: John Lennon

quote: Happiness is letting go of what you think your life is supposed to look like.
author: Anonymous

quote: The secret of happiness is not in doing what one likes, but in liking what one does.
author: James M. Barrie

quote: Happiness is not something you postpone for the future; it is something you design for the present.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: If you want to be happy, set a goal that commands your thoughts, liberates your energy, and inspires your hopes.
author: Andrew Carnegie

quote: The foolish man seeks happiness in the distance; the wise grows it under his feet.
author: James Oppenheim

quote: Happiness is the highest good.
author: Aristotle

quote: Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony.
author: Anonymous

quote: Happiness grows at our own firesides and is not to be picked in strangers' gardens.
author: Douglas Jerrold

quote: A joyful heart is the inevitable result of a heart burning with love.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Happiness is not a goal; it is a by-product.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: The secret of happiness is freedom, and the secret of freedom is courage.
author: Thucydides

quote: Happiness is contagious, spread it as much as you can.
author: Anonymous

quote: The best way to cheer yourself is to try to cheer someone else up.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Happiness is not in things; it is in us.
author: Richard Wagner

quote: True happiness is not attained through self-gratification, but through fidelity to a worthy purpose.
author: Helen Keller

quote: The happiest people don't necessarily have the best of everything, but they make the best of everything.
author: Anonymous

quote: Happiness is an inside job.
author: William Arthur Ward

quote: Happiness is a choice that requires effort at times.
author: Aeschylus

quote: The key to being happy is knowing you have the power to choose what to accept and what to let go.
author: Dodinsky

quote: Happiness is like a butterfly; the more you chase it, the more it will elude you.
author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quote: Happiness comes in waves. It’ll find you again.
author: Anonymous

quote: Happiness is not out there, it's in you.
author: Anonymous

quote: A happy heart makes a cheerful face.
author: Proverbs 15:13

quote: The greatest happiness you can give to others is your own happiness.
author: Anonymous

quote: It is not how much we have, but how much we enjoy, that makes happiness.
author: Charles Spurgeon

quote: A truly happy person is one who can enjoy the scenery on a detour.
author: Anonymous

quote: Happiness is found in the simplest of things.
author: Anonymous

quote: Do more of what makes you happy.
author: Anonymous

quote: There is no path to happiness: happiness is the path.
author: Buddha

quote: Happiness is the art of never holding in your mind the memory of any unpleasant thing that has passed.
author: Anonymous

quote: Happiness is not having what you want. It is appreciating what you have.
author: Anonymous

quote: Find joy in the ordinary.
author: Anonymous

quote: Happiness radiates like a fragrance from a flower and draws all good things towards you.
author: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi

quote: Enjoy the little things, for one day you may look back and realize they were the big things.
author: Robert Brault

quote: Happiness is a cup of coffee and a good book.
author: Anonymous

quote: Happiness often sneaks in through a door you didn’t know you left open.
author: John Barrymore

quote: Happiness is not in another place but this place, not for another hour but this hour.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: Happiness is a state of mind. It's just according to the way you look at things.
author: Walt Disney

quote: Happiness is homemade.
author: Anonymous

quote: Happiness comes when we stop complaining about the troubles we have and offer thanks for all the troubles we don’t have.
author: Anonymous

quote: Happiness is not found in achieving great things, but in the journey of becoming.
author: Anonymous

quote: Happiness is not the absence of problems, it’s the ability to deal with them.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: Happiness is not having a perfect life, but seeing the beauty in an imperfect one.
author: Anonymous

quote: Being happy never goes out of style.
author: Lilly Pulitzer

quote: Happiness starts with a smile.
author: Anonymous

quote: Collect beautiful moments, not things.
author: Anonymous

quote: Let your smile change the world, but don’t let the world change your smile.
author: Anonymous

quote: Find happiness in the simplest of moments.
author: Anonymous

quote: Happiness is the joy of discovering your own path.
author: Anonymous

quote: The happiest people make the best of everything.
author: Anonymous

quote: Happiness is knowing when to let go and move forward.
author: Anonymous

quote: Happiness is free. Sprinkle it everywhere.
author: Anonymous

quote: The only way to find true happiness is to risk being completely cut open.
author: Chuck Palahniuk

quote: Happiness is a gift and the trick is not to expect it, but to delight in it when it comes.
author: Charles Dickens

quote: If you want to live a happy life, tie it to a goal, not to people or things.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: There is only one happiness in this life, to love and be loved.
author: George Sand

quote: Sanity and happiness are an impossible combination.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Happiness is having a large, loving, caring, close-knit family in another city.
author: George Burns

quote: The more you praise and celebrate your life, the more there is in life to celebrate.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: No medicine cures what happiness cannot.
author: Gabriel García Márquez

quote: Happiness is being content with what you have, living in freedom and liberty, having a good family life and good friends.
author: Rose Kennedy

quote: Our envy always lasts longer than the happiness of those we envy.
author: Heraclitus

quote: Happiness is not a station you arrive at, but a manner of traveling.
author: Margaret Lee Runbeck

quote: The paradox of happiness is that when we search for it, we can't find it. But when we give it, it finds us.
author: Anonymous

quote: Man is fond of counting his troubles, but he does not count his joys.
author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quote: Happiness consists more in small conveniences or pleasures that occur every day, than in great pieces of good fortune that happen but seldom.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: One of the keys to happiness is a bad memory.
author: Rita Mae Brown

quote: True happiness... is not a surge of energy to be expended in a moment, but a continuous light and heat.
author: Charlotte Brontë

quote: My happiness grows in direct proportion to my acceptance, and in inverse proportion to my expectations.
author: Michael J. Fox

quote: Happiness is the intervals between periods of unhappiness.
author: Don Marquis

quote: The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Think of all the beauty still left around you and be happy.
author: Anne Frank

quote: Happiness is a perfume you cannot pour on others without getting a few drops on yourself.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Even a happy life cannot be without a measure of darkness, and the word happy would lose its meaning if it were not balanced by sadness.
author: Carl Jung

quote: Action may not always bring happiness; but there is no happiness without action.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: Happiness is a byproduct of an effort to make someone else happy.
author: Gretta Brooker Palmer

quote: The root of everything is a happy thought.
author: Anonymous

quote: True happiness is... to enjoy the present, without anxious dependence upon the future.
author: Seneca

quote: To be without some of the things you want is an indispensable part of happiness.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: Happiness is that state of consciousness which proceeds from the achievement of one's values.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: The only way to avoid being miserable is not to have enough leisure to wonder whether you are happy or not.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Joy is not in things; it is in us.
author: Richard Wagner

quote: Happiness is a virtue, not its reward.
author: Baruch Spinoza

quote: The essence of philosophy is that a man should so live that his happiness shall depend as little as possible on external things.
author: Epictetus

quote: We all live with the objective of being happy; our lives are all different and yet the same.
author: Anne Frank

quote: There is no happiness like that of being loved by your fellow-creatures, and feeling that your presence is an addition to their comfort.
author: Charlotte Brontë

quote: Success is getting what you want. Happiness is wanting what you get.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: Happiness is nothing more than good health and a bad memory.
author: Albert Schweitzer

quote: The secret of happiness is to admire without desiring.
author: Carl Sandburg

quote: Some cause happiness wherever they go; others whenever they go.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: I've got nothing to do today but smile.
author: Paul Simon

quote: You cannot judge what should make others happy, and others cannot judge what should make you happy.
author: Alan Cohen

quote: The discovery of a new dish does more for the happiness of the human race than the discovery of a star.
author: Anthelme Brillat-Savarin

quote: Tension is who you think you should be. Relaxation is who you are.
author: Chinese Proverb

quote: A table, a chair, a bowl of fruit and a violin; what else does a man need to be happy?
author: Albert Einstein

quote: If you want others to be happy, practice compassion. If you want to be happy, practice compassion.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Happiness is essentially a state of going somewhere, wholeheartedly, without regret or reservation.
author: William H. Sheldon

quote: To be kind to all, to like many and love a few, to be needed and wanted by those we love, is certainly the nearest we can come to happiness.
author: Mary Stuart

quote: Happiness is a how; not a what. A talent, not an object.
author: Hermann Hesse

quote: The moments of happiness we enjoy take us by surprise. It is not that we seize them, but that they seize us.
author: Ashley Montagu

quote: Everything has its wonders, even darkness and silence, and I learn, whatever state I may be in, therein to be content.
author: Helen Keller

quote: A string of excited, fugitive, miscellaneous pleasures is not happiness; happiness resides in imaginative reflection and judgment.
author: George Santayana
